Been updated since then... AGAIN. But hey, we're an ever evolving organism!

Hey look! A new design for this website, how wonderful for the start of the year!

This really isn't much of a drastic change, just a slight tweak to colours and general feel. Everything is still in the same place as it was with my previous design as changing that would be quite silly, /now, /work, /about pages as they were.

Here's some before and after images:

Very early days, but I wanted to update it a little and update it whenever I get some free time. Actually recording my website progress is a nice addition!
